segments.text: Are you ready to order , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm on a diet . So I have to avoid food containing too much fat . Do you have vegetarian dishes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , We do have some choices for ladies like you . What about some green salad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's a popular dish among young ladies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have three kinds of dressings for salad . Italian , French and Thousand Island . Which one would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you want to order something else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Milan Style Macaroni . Don't put sugar or salt on it , please .
segments.speaker: S2
